Project.Brief history of your project and organi: VICTORBTC Films is a film company focused on producing premium content, rooted in content creation with strong ties to the internet. It operates on an innovative partnership model, with elite teams working in close collaboration and a forward-looking approach to systematic operations. The company is dedicated to the investment, production, marketing, distribution, and derivation of super-series, films, and online shows, covering the entire entertainment value chain. With extensive experience in film production and resource integration within the industry, VICTORBTC Films specializes in creating “high-investment, high-quality, and high-market-impact” premium content. Its core services include content development, filming and production, publicity and distribution, and entertainment marketing.
